name: Lords of Free Kick
description:
Free Kick game woohoo! It has a 2 player cooperative mode and goal net physics :D

You can play with your friend/sibling/relative on shared screen or solo! Second player is auto spawned but will not move or impact gameplay if not controled. 
There are 20 balls (shots) and you have to try to score as many goals as possible. You gain a ball back if you scored. Me and my girlfriend love it so I decide to share it hh.

Player_1 controls ( Shooter ) ; 
- Mouse movement for angle adjustment
- LMB for shot power
- RMB for shot reset if you see shot is bad
- ARROW KEYS for all kinds of curves on the ball ( Watch the red point on the ball )

Player_2 controls ( Teammate );
A - walk left
D - walk right
Shift + A ( or D ) - running mode
R - jump ( hold for more bounce then release ) * Player can rotate in air to adjust his angle with A or D!*
F - volley shot ( hold for power and release )
V - sliding shot ( hold for power and release )

Hope you will like it. Comment on the game and enjoy it :)
